p: Herierin III was isolated as a colorless oil. The UV spectrum showed absorption maxima at 213.0 and 251.0 nm, suggesting a pyrone chromophore. The IR absorption spectrum showed bands at 3325.42 cm − 1 and 1662.89 cm − 1 due to the presence of OH and unsaturated ketone functions. The molecular formula of herierin III was established as C 8H 10O 4, based on HRESIMS spectrum where an [M + H] + peak was observed at m/z 171.0653.
